pkgmetadata.longdescription: Coil64 is inductance coil calculator, that allows to calculate the single-layer and multi-layer air core inductors, the ferrite toroid inductors or chokes, flat square coils on PCB etc. You can help to translate application by the Crowdin Coil64 project.
Coil64 是一款电感线圈计算器，可用于计算单层和多层空心电感、 铁氧体环形电感或扼流圈、PCB 上的扁平方形线圈等。 您可以通过 Crowdin Coil64 项目帮助翻译此应用程序。
